@@ -0,0 +1,175 @@ + + + + + + + JMRI: Frequently Asked Questions (General) + + + + + + + + + + + + +
+ +
+ +

JMRI: Frequently Asked Questions (General)

+

Work in Progress

+ +
+ +

This page is the JMRI general "frequently asked questions" list. Items get listed here if they're asked a + lot in user forums, of experienced users, and of developers, even the same information is available elsewhere + in the JMRI window help or on the JMRI site.

+ +

Additional FAQs are also avilable throughout the JMRI Help/Web site:

+
    +
  • PanelPro FAQ +
  • Getting Started With PanelPro +
  • DecoderPro FAQ +
  • Storing Your Work +
  • Scripting "How To" +
+ + +
+
Can I use JMRI to...
+ +
+
    +
  • Can I use JMRI to operate my DCC trains? + Yes. JMRI PanelPro provide the functions of a throttle to your DCC command station. + Can I use JMRI to program the decoders in my locomotives?

nodes.bodyText: I’m not a super expert in HTML so I basically follow models I find in other JMRI pages.  I looked up a “dictionary list” online but couldn’t find it.  I looked up dt/dl but they seem to be something different: “The “dt“ tag defines a term/name in a description list.  The “dt” tag is used in conjunction with “dl” (defines a description list) and “dd” (describes each term/name).”  Thanks.
